mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, reg_date = reg_date where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, u.username, f.id AS fileId, e.content, a.rating_value FROM rating a JOIN review e ON a.review_id = e.id JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN files f ON u.id = f.fk_id AND f.division = 'profile' WHERE e.movie_id = #{id} ORDER BY e.reg_date DESC
